title: Hachiman's Fury
description: Perform a series of lightning-fast strikes against a group of enemies. Costs 3 Resolve.

title: Spirit Pull
description: While active, your Spirit Pull passively siphons health from a nearby enemy. Base cooldown 36s.

title: Explosive Blade
description: Melee attacks deal damaging explosions on impact. Base cooldown 36s.

title: Defender
description: Increases base health by 25.

title: Deep Strikes
description: Increases Melee damage by 10%.

title: Samurai Unleashed
description: Decrease class ability cooldown by 15%.

title: Lightning Reflexes
description: Parry incoming arrows while blocking.

title: Critical Defense
description: Increased parry and dodge window when at low health.

title: Resolve Increase
description: Increase max Resolve by 1.

title: Heavenly Strike
description: Perform an unblockable quick strike. O+Triangle to activate. Costs 1 Resolve.

title: Hachiman's Frenzy
description: Hachiman's Fury gains 2 extra strikes.

title: Legendary
description: Increases the number of Legendary items you can equip by 1.

title: Eye of Uchitsune
description: Target 3 enemies and fire a guaranteed headshot at each target. Costs 3 Resolve.

title: Staggering Arrow
description: Fire an arrow that stuns enemies in a small area. Base cooldown 55s.

title: Explosive Arrow
description: Fire an arrow that explodes after a short delay. Base cooldown 55s.

title: Executioner
description: Increase headshot damage by 50% for targets within 12 meters.

title: Scent of Blood
description: Increase draw and reload speed by 100% for 30 seconds after attempting an assassination.

title: Hunter Unleased
description: Decrease class ability cooldown by 15%.

title: Resupply
description: Refill 30% of all ammo types. x while aiming to activate. Costs 1 Resolve.

title: Status Damage
description: Damage of status effects increased by 25%.

title: Piercing Arrow
description: Unlock Piercing Arrows for your bow that can penetrate shields.

title: Pinpoint
description: Body shots with the bow have a 50% chance to deal headshot damage.

title: All-Seeing Eye
description: Eye of Uchitsune can target 2 more enemies.

title: Legendary
description: Increases the number of Legendary items you can equip by 1.

title: Breath of Izanami
description: Revive all downed allies. Costs 3 Resolve.

title: Spirit Animal
description: Summon a friendly dog companion for a short amount of time. Base cooldown 65s.

title: Healing Incense
description: Deploy a small pot of incense that heals nearby allies. Base cooldown 42s.

title: Enhanced Ghost Weapons
description: Increase damage from all Ghost Weapons by 50%.

title: Weakening Burst
description: Weaken enemies so they deal 25% less damage and take 25% more damage. R1+x to activate. Costs 1 Resolve.

title: Ronin Unleashed
description: Decrease class ability cooldown by 15%.

title: Staggering Impostion
description: Increases Stagger damage inflicted by 15%.

title: Resolve Increase
description: Increases max Resolve by 1.

title: Quick Regen
description: Increase healing received and health regen by 50%.

title: Soothing Breath
description: Breath of Izanami now also applies a heal over time on all player for 8 seconds.

title: Fire Breath
description: Breath of Izanami now also ignites enemies near all players.

title: Legendary
description: Increases the number of Legendary items you can equip by 1.

title: Shadow Strike
description: Enter the shadows and strike enemies from a distance. Costs 3 Resolve.

title: Toxic Vanish
description: Vanish in a cloud of poison smoke that deals Stagger damage to nearby enemies. Base cooldown 62s.

title: Group Vanish
description: Vanish along with nearby allies. Base cooldown 50s.

title: Critical Hit
description: Inflict 30% more damage during assassinations.

title: Super Strike
description: Perform a stronger Stealth Attack dealing 2x normal damage.

title: Assassin Unleashed
description: Decrease class ability cooldown by 15%.

title: Experienced Assassin
description: Stealth attacks are faster and quiet.

title: Light Step
description: You are silent when running.

title: Opportunist
description: Deals 50% bonus assassination damage to Staggered enemies.

title: Shadow Storm
description: Shadow Strike gains 2 extra strikes.

title: Chain Vanish
description: Successfully assassinating an enemy while vanished re-activates vanish and refreshes the duration.

title: Legendary
description: Increases the number of Legendary items you can equip by 1.
